mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airline_schedule( take_off_airport, landing_airport, take_off_date, landing_date, airplaneCode, price ) VALUES ( #{takeOffAirport}, #{landingAirport}, STR_TO_DATE(#{takeOffDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), STR_TO_DATE(#{landingDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{airplaneCode}, #{price} )
mapper.select: SELECT take_off_airport, landing_airport, take_off_date, landing_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, take_off_date, landing_date) take_minute, '' via_airport, price, '' via_airline_01, '' via_airline_02 FROM AIRLINE_SCHEDULE WHERE take_off_airport = ${takeOffAirport} AND landing_airport = ${landingAirpot} AND landing_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(${beginArriveDate}, '%Y%m%d %H%i') AND STR_TO_DATE(${endArriveDate}, '%Y%m%d %H%i') UNION ALL SELECT SC1.take_off_airport, SC2.landing_airport, SC1.take_off_date, SC2.landing_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, SC1.take_off_date, SC2.landing_date) take_minute, SC1.landing_airport via_airport, SC1.price + SC2.price price, SC2.airline_schedule_no via_airline_01, '' via_airline_02 FROM AIRLINE_SCHEDULE SC1, AIRLINE_SCHEDULE SC2 WHERE SC1.landing_airport = SC2.take_off_airport AND SC1.take_off_date > SC2.landing_date - INTERVAL 36 HOUR AND SC1.take_off_date < SC2.landing_Date AND SC1.take_off_airport = ${takeOffAirport} AND SC2.landing_airport = ${landingAirpot} AND SC2.landing_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(${beginArriveDate}, '%Y%m%d %H%i') AND STR_TO_DATE(${endArriveDate}, '%Y%m%d %H%i') UNION ALL SELECT SC1.take_off_airport, SC3.landing_airport, SC1.take_off_date, SC3.landing_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, SC1.take_off_date, SC3.landing_date) take_minute, concat(SC1.landing_airport, ', ', SC2.landing_airport) via_airport, SC1.price + SC2.price + SC3.price price, SC2.airline_schedule_no via_airline_01, SC3.airline_schedule_no via_airline_02 FROM AIRLINE_SCHEDULE SC1, AIRLINE_SCHEDULE SC2, AIRLINE_SCHEDULE SC3 WHERE SC1.landing_airport = SC2.take_off_airport AND SC2.landing_airport = SC3.take_off_airport AND SC1.take_off_airport != SC3.take_off_airport AND SC1.take_off_date > SC3.landing_date - INTERVAL 36 HOUR AND SC1.take_off_date < SC2.landing_Date AND SC2.take_off_date < SC3.landing_date AND SC1.take_off_airport = ${takeOffAirport} AND SC3.landing_airport = ${landingAirpot} AND SC3.landing_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(${beginArriveDate}, '%Y%m%d %H%i') AND STR_TO_DATE(${endArriveDate}, '%Y%m%d %H%i')
SELECT * FROM AIRLINE_SCHEDULE WHERE #airportType# = #iata# AND #dateType# BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#beginDate#, '%Y%m%d %H%i%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(#endDate#, '%Y%m%d %H%i%s')
